title: Previous Date of a KüA plan entry
description: Represents a former location and/or time of the entry on the KüA plan for informative purposes.

id.description: The unique identifier of the previous date

comment.description: A short comment about why the entry has been moved from this location/time.

begin.description: The former begin of the KüA. May be identical to the current begin.

end.description: The former end of the KüA. May be identical to the current end.

room.description: List of unique identifiers of the rooms, where the KüA was supposed to happen. May be identical to the current list of rooms.
